SELECT go.orderid, go.ordercode, go.ordertime, go.goodsid,address, go.receive, go.memberid, go.telphone, go.STATUS, go.integral, go.memo, go.expressid, go.expressnums, gi.goodsname, gi.price FROM goods_order go JOIN goods_info gi ON gi.goodsid = go.goodsid AND gi.isdelete = '1' where 1=1
and go.receive like concat('%',#{receive},'%')
and gi.goodsname like concat('%',#{goodsname},'%')
and go.telphone= #{telphone}

SELECT go.orderid, go.ordercode, go.ordertime, go.goodsid,address, go.receive, go.memberid, go.telphone, go.STATUS, go.integral, go.memo, go.expressid, go.expressnums, gi.goodsname, gi.price, gi.goodsimg FROM goods_order go JOIN goods_info gi ON gi.goodsid = go.goodsid AND gi.isdelete = '1' where orderid=#{orderid}
